quotes.quote: "I am motivate for any destination that you have to offer, just WOW!"
quotes.author: Alice Babenga

quotes.quote: "WOW air has some hot looking stewardesses"
quotes.author: Steve Murphy

quotes.quote: "The staff was friendly, the flight was clean and the toilettes smelled incredible!"
quotes.author: Gina Fierce

quotes.quote: "I have always been fully satisfied with my trip with WOW air!"
quotes.author: Maria Petersen

quotes.quote: "The staff is very sweet and helpful"
quotes.author: Anna Madsen

quotes.quote: "WOW air, i love flying with you, you're seriously lit!"
quotes.author: Keenan Ranley
